requirements.install: git clone https://github.com/ameenmaali/urldedupe.git --depth 1 &>/dev/null && cd urldedupe && cmake CMakeLists.txt &>/dev/null && make &>/dev/null && mv urldedupe /usr/local/bin/ && cd .. && rm -rf urldedupe

command: curl -s 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rix4uni/WordList/refs/heads/main/payloads/xss/favourite.txt' | unew -q favourite.txt && if grep -qv '^rix4uni' 'favourite.txt';then sed -i 's/^/rix4uni/' 'favourite.txt';fi

cat ${INPUT} | urldedupe -s | grep -aE '=|%3D' | egrep -aiv '.(jpg|jpeg|gif|css|tif|tiff|png|ttf|woff|woff2|icon|pdf|svg|txt|js)' | egrep -av '/[0-9]+[-/][0-9]+[-/][0-9]+' | pvreplace -silent -payload favourite.txt -fuzzing-part param-value -fuzzing-type replace -fuzzing-mode single | xsschecker -nc -match 'rix4uni' -vuln -t 100 -timeout 15 -retries 1 2>/dev/null | sed 's/^Vulnerable: \[[^]]*\] \[[^]]*\] //' | unew -el -t ${OUTPUT}
echo -e '\n\033[1;32mYou can run pyxss to check false positive or check manually one by one url in chrome\033[0m'
description: Custom XSS checker workflow with xsschecker
